overview: The sequal to Chi Chi LaRue's Oral Exams, Detention features Matt Summers back into trouble and in Detention. The GAYVN Award Winning film features Johnny Hazzard in his first on-screen appearance. The bad boys of this school really know how to take a punishment in this two-and-a-half hour epic suck-and-fuck fest. Directors cut includes watersports and broomstick action.
tagline: Director Chi Chi La Rue conducts detention examinations that you should not miss! This time it's pushy!
title: Detention
